لأبي بكير

li ʾabī bukayr:in ḥafiẓa hu ăl lāhu min
ʾabī ǧamīla
bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ĭdfaʿ ʾilà nuṣayr:ini ăl ḫādimi fī
ṣalāḥi ḥaqqi hi dīnār 1/6 suds
ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu wa kutiba fī ʾabīfiha
3 sanaẗa 200
bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ḥafiẓa hu ăl lāhu
li ʾabī bukayr:in

To Abû Bukair - may God protect him - from
Abû Gamîl.
In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!
Hand over to Nuṣair, the servant, for
balancing his (legal) claim dînâr 1/6, a sixth,
please God. And it has been written on the 3rd of Epiphi
of the year 200.
In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!
May God protect him.
To A[bû] Bukair.
